dict.acceptation: 方便的；手边的，附近的；便于使用的；手巧的；

sent.orig: Handy to believe that the firm could arrange an 8 percent fixed-rate medium term loan.
sent.trans: Handy相信企业能够商定一笔固定利率8%的中期贷款。

sent.orig: Handy highlights the importance of functionality, much appreciated in Germany.
sent.trans: “Handy”突出实用性，而这是德国人非常重视的。

sent.orig: Bitboards also quite handy for move generation.
sent.trans: 位棋盘对于行棋也非常方便。

sent.orig: The handy dandy Seal Lock allows you to never worry for your equipments again!
sent.trans: 便利绝妙的封印锁让你再也不用担心你的装备！

sent.orig: He is handy at repairing watches.
